text: (napiyiṉ maṉaivikaḷē!) Nīṅkaḷ uṅkaḷ vīṭukaḷilēyē taṅkiyiruṅkaḷ; muṉṉar aññāṉa kālattil (peṇkaḷ) tirintu koṇṭiruntataip pōl nīṅkaḷ tiriyātīrkaḷ; toḻukaiyai muṟaippaṭi uṟutiyuṭaṉ kaṭaippiṭittu toḻuṅkaḷ; jakāttum koṭuttu vāruṅkaḷ. Allāhvukkum, avaṉuṭaiya tūtarukkum kīḻpaṭiyuṅkaḷ; (napiyiṉ) vīṭṭaiyuṭaiyavarkaḷē! Uṅkaḷai viṭṭum acuttaṅkaḷai nīkki, uṅkaḷai muṟṟilum paricuttamākkiviṭavē allāh nāṭukiṟāṉ
